description:
Imagine what would cost you if you were to present a boring powerpoint presentation?

Time?

Job?

Money?

Did you know that “You Only Have 7 Seconds To Make A Strong First Impression”?

Many people failed to make a strong first impression with Powerpoint Presentation not because they were not capable of doing it, but simply because they DIDN’t know how to do it.

What if I share with you simple ideas and techniques on creating a Powerpoint Presentation that Moves and Sells. These ideas are like a cheating list that will literally transform the way you design a powerpoint presentation. I called these techniques as ZENSLIDES.

In Zenslides, we will discover 4 design(deZEN) principles that can elicit and spark visual excitement to your audiences. And all these principles are recorded in video PLUS you will be given the sample slides for you to further discover the techniques.

For your information, I am adding a new material every now and then. You can also submit your slides for discussion. Our aim is to create a better presentation world.

If you are not happy with Zenslides I am more than happy to refund your money. Please refer to the udemy refund policy.

Cheers.
title: Simple Ideas on Powerpoint Slides Design
instructors: Founder of Zenslides Wan Yusof Wan Jeffery
